cast.overview: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations.
cast.title: Little Children

details.biography: Stan Carp is an actor. He has a recurring co-starring role in the first season as the grieving father Al Strauss. He has also appeared in the films The Last Supper (2000), Passengers (2002) , Little Children (2006), and Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief (2010).
details.name: Stan Carp
